price: 38 Pour ma part, j’ai pour Seigneur Allah auquel je n’associe aucune divinité.
arabic: لَّٰكِنَّا۠ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِرَبِّيٓ أَحَدٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: lākinnā huwa al-lahu rabbī walā ush'riku birabbī aḥadan
